column4: patience is a powerful ally ;) so is creative problemsolvingskills. I'm sure you will manage if you have some of each =)
ive tryed in almost every thread in ubuntu, no one get an anwser just like me

i cant believe i need to have my files locally, my library is very big, is in an external HD. it was so easy in winamp, just one scan of the external HD and that all a library was created, everytime i close and opened again, it was there
maybe you don't? there surely must be some way around it. carry on, as long as you don't give up then there is a chance you will solve the problem on your own.
welcome back & well done =) you probably did something even if you don't know what you did, I do that all the time ^^
i dont like that :( but it worked :p
why not? you solved the problem after all. swap is the virtual memory, mostly a small partition on your hdd
im a man of science i like to know why things happen, i dont believe in magic :p

I see 'magic' as the things we see happen but can't understand. After all, we are only human ;) hope you will have the patience to learn this great OS, some day you might understand all of it (unlikely tho) :P
what's your problem today?
scrobbling?
send song i have listened to last.fm
they say that we scientific ppl have magical hands when it comes to solving problems. hell I don't understand all I do at all times either. well done =P
now theres another impossible problem, is about my mx5000 keyboard, it does sync with the laptop, but i does nothing, BEAT DAT!
a neat challenge for you to deal with then, problemsolving is to me both rewarding and mostly fun =)
maybe it's a driver issue?
iono i must investigate, but now im finding the san francisco rush: extreme racing OST, anyone?
come to the offtopic channel & discuss it there, this is support after all ;)
